Package frc.robot.lib

Class EncoderLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SendableBase
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
        • frc.robot.lib.EncoderLib
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class EncoderLib
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
    Basic library to convert a bunch of different units around encoder raw units. This involves things like revolutions and distance.

    • Method Detail

      • rawToRotation

        public static double rawToRotation​(int rawPosition,
                                   double unitsPerRotation)
        Converts raw sensor position to rotations. rawPosition is the raw ticks (out of 4096) of the encoder, unitsPerRotation are 40996, and this will return the total number of rotations
        Parameters:
        rawPosition -
        unitsPerRotation -
        Returns:
        rotations

      • rotationsToRaw

        public static double rotationsToRaw​(double rotations,
                                    double unitsPerRotation)
        Converts raw sensor position to rotations. Units are full rotations of the object.
        Parameters:
        rotations -
        unitsPerRotation -
        Returns:
        rawPosition

      • rotationsToDistance

        public static double rotationsToDistance​(double rotations,
                                         double effectiveDiam)
        Converts rotations to physical distance. Units are the same as the radius.
        Parameters:
        rotations -
        effectiveDiam -
        Returns:
        distance

      • distanceToRotations

        public static double distanceToRotations​(double distance,
                                         double effectiveDiam)
        Converts distance to rotations. Units are the same as the radius.
        Parameters:
        distance -
        effectiveDiam -
        Returns:
        rotations

        public static double distanceToRaw​(double distance,
                                   double effectiveDiam,
                                   double unitsPerRotation)
        Converts a distance to raw position (delta or absolute)
        Parameters:

        effectiveDiam - in feet
        unitsPerRotation - in raw encoder units
        Returns:
